Name: Suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year.
Text:
Int. No. 112

By Council Members Vallone, Constantinides, Koo, Mendez and Richards

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year. 
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Subchapter 2 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-163.3 to read as follows:
      � 19-163.3. No parking meter or muni-meter shall be activated on Asian Lunar New Year.
      � 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
      


GZ/LF
2/3/2014
LS 487
